title: Application Developer
tagsAndSkills: Core Java,GIT,android application development,Memory management,Eclipse,android studio,Animation,SDK
jobDescription:
• We are looking for a Mobile Application Developer who possesses a passion for mobile technologies and will work with the next generation payment gateway platform.
  • Design and build iOS and Android mobile applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyse, design, and ship new features.
  • Fully responsible for mobile app development in the team.
  • Build and publish applications in app stores.
  • Implement new technologies to maximise application performance.
  • Excellent knowledge in core Java.
  • Hands-on experience in the full life cycle of Android application development.
  • Strong knowledge in RESTful web services.
  • Good Knowledge of Android SDK's.
  • Push Notifications Toast.
  • Eclipse ANT based build system.
  • Android Studio.
  • Experience in Gradle.
  • Very good experience with Objective-C and iOS SDK.
  • Good working knowledge in Cocoa Touch.
  • Experience with memory management and caching mechanisms specific to mobile devices.
  • Experience working with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, Core.
  • Experience in Payment gateway integration in mobile apps is a big plus.
  • A portfolio of iOS/Android apps in the Play Store/app store is a plus.
  • Hands-on experience with Android studio gradle build system.

title: Full Stack Web Application Developer
jobDescription:
HTML/CSS JavaScript Node js React Angular MongoDB MySQL RESTful API Git UI/UX Design AWS Docker Web Security MVC DevOps Responsive Web Design PHP Laravel Ruby on Rails Django ASPdot net Java Nginx Apache Payment Gateway Integration

  • We are looking for experienced Full Stack Web Developers for our Web Services IT Agencies/Companies in the USA.
  • As a Full Stack Developer, you should be comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks, and third-party libraries.
  • You should also be a team player with a knack for visual design and utility. Writing clean, functional code on the front and back end is a must along with expertise in testing and fixing bugs or other coding issues.

Job Responsibilities:
  • Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions.
  • Design client-side and server-side architecture.
  • Build the front end of web applications through appealing visual design.
  • Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications.
  • Write effective APIs. Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software. Create security and data protection settings.
  • Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design.
  • Write technical documentation.

Experience Skills:
  • Proven experience as a Full Stack Web Developer or similar role.
  • Experience in developing web applications. Familiarity with common stacks.
  • Knowledge of front-end languages libraries (eg HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, jQuery).
  • Knowledge of required back-end language (eg C#, PHP, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (eg Angular, React, Node js).
  • Familiarity with Databases (eg MySQL, MongoDB), Web Servers (eg Apache), and UI/UX design.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills. Attention to detailing. An analytical mind.
  • Organizational skills. Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or a relevant field.
Infrastructure Required:
  • Uninterrupted quiet workspace with a comfortable, table, chair, and clean backdrops.
  • A fast computer, The camera on at Zoom calls all the time, 15MB internet connection.
  • Business casual every day. UPS or Generator Backup (If Required).

title: iOS Application Developer
jobDescription:
• We hope to recruit a talented iOS Developer to configure, assemble, build and maintain the new age of iOS applications
  • Your main focus will be developing highquality iOS applications for the most recent ios devices
  • In addition, your duties may incorporate working together with the designing team for new applications, distinguishing and fixing application bugs, maintaining the core code, and updating applications released on the App Store


iOS App Developer Responsibilities :
  • Designing and building portable applications for Apples iOS platform.
  • Collaborating with the designing department to characterize application features.
  • Ensuring quality and execution of the application to specifications.
  • Identifying possible issues and settling application bottlenecks.
  • Fixing application bugs before definite delivery.
  • Publishing application on App Store.
  • Maintaining the code and reviewing the application.
  • Designing and releasing application updates.

iOS App Developer Skills Required :
  • Proficiency in ObjectiveC, Swift, Cocoa Touch.
  • Knowledge of frameworks such as Core Data, Core Graphics, Core Animation, and Core Text. Candidates with knowledge about frameworks can get some additional advantages.
  • Basic knowledge of thirdparty libraries and APIs.
  • Excellent coding and editing abilities.
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.
  • Strong project management and interpersonal skills.
  • Familiarity with message popups, APIs and cloud informing.
  • Excellent communication skills and can work in a team.
